EmailTemplate.description: This template will be used in the store visit summary email
EmailTemplate.name: 3PL Marketing Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: 3PL Manager Review Summary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
While reviewing marketing materials, the following things were observed:
Display not setup according to POG?<input type="checkbox" checked ='{!IF(Store_Activity__c.Display_not_setup_according_to_POG__c,'True','False')}' value='Display not setup according to POG?'> <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Able_to_improve_location_of_table__c}> Able to improve location of table? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Tablet_not_loaded_with_attractor_loop__c}> Tablet not loaded with attractor loop? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Tablet_not_loaded_with_XF_video__c}> Tablet not loaded with XF video? <checkbox:{!Store_Activity__c.Materials_not_current__c}> Materials not current? Out of date materials: {!Store_Activity__c.Please_select_out_of_date_materials__c}
